title: Tiong Bahru Plaza - Family Shopping Destination
blurb: A family-friendly shopping destination in Singapore.
description: Tiong Bahru Plaza is a shopping mall that offers a variety of stores, promotions, and events suitable for families. It provides a customer service counter, accessibility guide, and various quick links for easy navigation and assistance. The mall aims to create a convenient and enjoyable shopping experience for families with children. It includes stores, dining options and amenities catering to family needs. The mall also features a loyalty program and gift cards.
full_address: Tiong Bahru Plaza 302 Tiong Bahru Rd Singapore 168732 (65) 6276 4686 Get Directions Customer Service Counter Level 2 Opening Hours: 10am to 10pm Redemption Hours: 10am to 9

title: Tiong Bahru Plaza - Family-Friendly Shopping Mall
blurb: A shopping destination with stores, dining, and services.
description: Tiong Bahru Plaza offers a variety of retail stores, dining options, and services suitable for families. The mall provides a comfortable shopping environment with amenities catering to both adults and children. Explore a range of shops, enjoy family meals, and access essential services all in one convenient location. The mall aims to provide a pleasant and convenient experience for families visiting Tiong Bahru Plaza. Discover a wide array of offerings designed to cater to the needs of families and individuals alike. Enjoy a day out with the family at Tiong Bahru Plaza.

title: Tiong Bahru Plaza: A Family-Friendly Shopping Haven
blurb: Discover family fun at Tiong Bahru Plaza today!
description: Tiong Bahru Plaza offers a variety of family-friendly stores and amenities, creating a welcoming environment for parents and children. From retail outlets to dining options, the mall caters to the needs of families looking for a convenient and enjoyable shopping experience. Explore the diverse range of shops and services designed to enhance your family outings. Enjoy a day of shopping, dining, and quality time with your loved ones in a comfortable and accessible setting. The mall provides a safe and engaging space for families to create lasting memories together. Discover the perfect blend of convenience and entertainment for the whole family at Tiong Bahru Plaza.

title: Tiong Bahru Plaza - Family-Friendly Shopping Venue
blurb: Discover family-friendly shopping at Tiong Bahru Plaza.
description: Tiong Bahru Plaza offers a variety of family-friendly shopping and dining options. Explore retail stores catering to children's needs, enjoy delicious meals at family-friendly restaurants, and participate in engaging activities suitable for all ages. The mall provides a comfortable and convenient environment for families to spend quality time together. With a wide range of amenities and services, Tiong Bahru Plaza ensures a pleasant and memorable experience for both parents and children. Discover the perfect blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment for the whole family at Tiong Bahru Plaza.

title: Tiong Bahru Plaza Family-Friendly Amenities
blurb: Diaper changing, nursing rooms, water refill station.
description: Tiong Bahru Plaza offers convenient amenities for families, including diaper changing stations for parents with infants, dedicated nursing rooms for mothers, and water refill stations to stay hydrated while shopping and enjoying the mall. These facilities ensure a comfortable and hassle-free experience for families visiting the plaza. The amenities are designed to cater to the needs of parents and children, making Tiong Bahru Plaza a welcoming destination for family outings and shopping trips. Enjoy a relaxed and convenient visit with these thoughtful services.

title: Tiong Bahru Plaza Family Activities and Amenities
blurb: Family-friendly shopping and dining experiences await you.
description: Tiong Bahru Plaza offers a variety of family-friendly activities and amenities to make your visit enjoyable. Explore a range of retail stores catering to children's needs, from clothing to toys. Enjoy diverse dining options with kid-friendly menus and comfortable seating. The mall provides amenities such as nursing rooms and diaper changing stations for parents' convenience. With a welcoming atmosphere and convenient facilities, Tiong Bahru Plaza is an ideal destination for families to shop, dine, and spend quality time together. Discover engaging activities and create lasting memories at Tiong Bahru Plaza.
